General::PortType portType_

Detailed Description

Equals the spirit:port element in IP-Xact specification.

Defines the logical port information for the containing abstraction definition.

Definition at line 23 of file portabstraction.h.

Exception guarantee: basic

Exceptions:
Parse_error Occurs when mandatory element is missing
Parameters:

void PortAbstraction::setTransactional ( TransactionalAbstraction *  transactional  ) 

Set the transactional element for this port.

Calling this function will delete old transactional and wire elements and change the port type into transactional.

Parameters:
transactional A pointer to the new transactional element.

QSharedPointer<TransactionalAbstraction> PortAbstraction::transactional_ [private]

MANDATORY spirit:transactional (either wire or transactional is mandatory) Pointer to the Transactional instance. If the port is wire the pointer is a null pointer.
